Footer.description: Your trusted store for high-quality electrical products at the best prices in Egypt

WhyChooseUs.quality_content: All our products are original and guaranteed
WhyChooseUs.support_content: Support team available around the clock
WhyChooseUs.header_description: A company specialized in providing and selling high-quality electrical products and solutions, where we work to meet the needs of individuals and companies through an integrated range of reliable products that combine efficiency, safety, and high performance

About.section_text: A leading company in manufacturing and supplying high-quality electrical tools and supplies, Energy Elhadad provides safe and reliable products that meet the needs of homes, industrial, and commercial projects. Energy Elhadad was founded with the aim of offering electrical products that combine high quality, safety, and affordable price. We have extensive experience in the field of manufacturing electrical tools, and we always strive to develop practical solutions that help our customers accomplish their work with efficiency and confidence. We serve thousands of customers, including individuals, companies, and contractors, through products designed according to the highest technical and engineering standards.

sections.title: Terms of Use
items: The user must be 18 years of age or older, or use the site under parental supervision.
The user is obligated to provide correct and accurate information when registering or purchasing.
It is prohibited to use the site for any illegal purposes or in violation of applicable regulations.

sections.title: Accounts
items: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account data.
Store management reserves the right to suspend or delete any account in the event of suspicion of illegal use or violation of the terms.

sections.title: Products and Pricing
items: We strive to display products and prices accurately; however, unintentional errors may occur.
The store reserves the right to modify prices or suspend any product at any time without prior notice.
Images shown are for illustrative purposes and the actual product may differ slightly.

sections.title: Orders and Payment
items: The order is confirmed upon successful completion of the payment process.
All payments are processed through secure and verified payment gateways.
The store reserves the right to cancel any order if there is a problem with payment or product availability.

sections.title: Shipping and Delivery
items: Orders are delivered to the address determined by the customer during purchase.
Delivery times vary depending on the geographical location and shipping company.
The store is not responsible for any delay caused by the shipping company or circumstances beyond its control.

sections.title: Returns and Exchanges
items: The customer has the right to request a return or exchange within 14 days from the date of receipt, provided the product is in its original condition.
The return policy does not cover used, damaged, or customized products.
The customer bears the shipping costs in cases of return unless the error was from the store.

sections.title: General Terms of Use
items: These terms and conditions are subject to the laws and regulations in force in the local country.
The store reserves the right to update these terms at any time, and users will be notified of any significant changes.

ContactUs.section_description: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

ContactUs.invalid_message: Message must be at least 10 characters
ContactUs.success_message: Your message has been sent successfully.
ContactUs.error_message: Failed to send message. Please try again.
